extension.name: tksdfractionslider
extension.author: Tomasz Kisielewski
extension.description: TKSD fractionslider.A joomla responsive image slider module.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Enable jQuery?
field.description: Turn on or off inlcuded jQuery. Will also call in a noconflict script.

field.name: increase
field.label: Increase
field.description: if set, slider is allowed to get bigger than basic dimensions
